versos: (sun) Psalm 113:3 - "From the rising of the sun to the place where it sets, the name of the Lord is to be praised.";;;
(jeremiah) jeremiah 1:5 - "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.";;;
(wise) "Who is wise and understanding among you Let them show it by their good life, by deeds done in the humility that comes from wisdom." - James 3:13 NIV;;;
(faith) Hebrews 11:1 - "Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.";;;
(charges) 1 Timothy 1:3: As I urged you when I went into Macedonia
(labour) 2 Thessalonians 3:10 - "For even when we were with you, we gave you this rule: 'The one who is unwilling to work shall not eat.'";;;
(overseer) 1 Timothy 3:1 - "Here is a trustworthy saying: Whoever aspires to be an overseer desires a noble task.";;;
(peace) John 14:27 - peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.;;

(thereby) 2 Chronicles 7:14: If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin, and will heal their land.;;;
(war) 2 Samuel 22:35 - He trains my hands for war
(judged) Matthew 7:1 "Do not judge, or you too will be judged.";;;

(arms) Isaiah 9:6 - For to us a child is born, to us a son is given; and the government shall be upon his shoulder, and his name shall be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.;;;
(indeed) Acts 21:34 - Some in the crowd shouted one thing and some another
(provoked) Hebrews 3:16 - "Who were they that heard and yet were rebellious Was it not all who came out of Egypt, led by Moses";;;
(judah) Isaiah 37:31 - "And the surviving remnant of the house of judah shall again take root downward and bear fruit upward.";;;

(giving) Luke 6:38 - "Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.";;;
(findeth) Matthew 7:8 - "For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.";;;
(pleasure) 1 Timothy 5:6 - "But she who lives in pleasure is dead while she lives.";;;
